Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central Park/16th
ShortDescription: Southbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park: due to, street blockage near Central Park/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, 16th and Central Park: due to, street blockage near Central Park/16th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
